title: Ralph's Gift 2: Erotic Romance
description: Alice believed she was spending her remaining days in this world in blissful abandon with the one man who could love her with no questions asked. He understood her more than she could understand her life. She has stopped asking questions. She just wanted to be happy with him.But she only knew half of what Ralph was. In him lived the soul of a great healer. Was it just coincidence that they met and fell in love when her body needed life while his life needed purpose? Was it just love that drew them to each other? Or was it something more?What mattered more? To live a life when she was dying or to experience death when he finally began to live? This story has both. And in the end, a promise of redemption for them both.
author: Sandra Ross
